body: You need an account to use exhentai, though.
@hargames You can upload lolicon content to e-hentai, but it doesn't appear when you browse. At exhentai, however, this doesn't happen, since un the uncensored version on the web.
Ok i think this is literally my favorite artist
@blavatskyproject you update it on e-hentai but there no lolicon on e-hentai??? 🤔

@JackDanielsx7 It should work as it does at exhentai. This version it's simply better, an update for the previous one, so it should take its place. As it is now, this version has 1/10 of the favourites the other does, so people will keep going there while this one gets ignored. That's a pity.
@blavatskyproject ah okay. Well that's sucks alot. Someone should work or atleast be a mod for this site so they can remove re-uploads.

@JackDanielsx7 No one updates anything to nhentai, we do it to e-hentai/exhentai. There, when you find an error or something you want to change, you just update that gallery. It appears as something new, but all the interactions, voteas, etc it had remain the same; in other words, it's the same entry. The problem is when nhentai collects doujins from there. The web doesn't know if is new material or an update, and therefore uploads it as a new entry. So, it's not us who do that. it's the web. Hope this helped clarify your thoughts.
Seriously. Why do these artists always reupload their content after posting it a couple days earlier. Like come on Jeez.
W work W plot W doujin

It's a pity that the fixed version has to carry the "rough translation" and "rough grammar" tags just because it was uploaded here before they were voted down enough in exhentai. Also, the other version reached popular section, so I think everyone will keep reading that one for years to come. That version wasn't horrible at all, it's quite decent for a work of mine, but yeah, it's also a pity.
Slightly improved translation and layout fixes.
This is super cute.  Cunny approvel 😭
